name: Super Taskforce Simulator
description:
GO GO SUPER TASKFORCE!
The world is in danger! (again). However, you realise that your robot requires repair due to damages from previous battles. Quick! It is time to repair and assemble the robot parts and deal with that annoying danger.

Fly your robot part to the middle and start assembling!

How to play

In the beginning, control a robot part and maneuver to the center of the screen. You can select the robot parts by press keyboard key that matches the robot parts letter.  Assemble them to form words. The more complex the word is the higher score you will get.

Controls

  • Move forward - Arrow up key
  • Turn left/right - Left & Right Arrow keys
  • Select a robot part - Press the corresponding letter on your keyboard E.g a to select a ship with letter a
  • Snap join with parts - Space bar
  • Get new sets of letters - Enter key
